content: Misty Cloud is the second foe that will appear. His weapon of choice is a burning log of incense that he swings around, usually in sets of three. Dodge each swing until the combo is complete before rushing in to land your own hits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Misty_Cloud,_Cloudy_Mist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Misty Cloud is the second foe that will appear. His weapon of choice is a burning log of incense that he swings around, usually in sets of three. Dodge each swing until the combo is complete before rushing in to land your own hits.
